title: Unstructured for a summer
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Activity programs in education

description: In the summer of 1968 a group of high-school students from Quebec and Ontario worked on a filmmaking project with the help of the National Film Board. The students discuss their reactions and evaluations of the project.
